body.name: 65PCS Pampas Grass Decor, Including pompas Floral, Reed Dried Grass and Bunny Tails Dried Flowers, Natural Dried Pampas Grass Bouquet for Boho Decor Wedding, Home Decoration
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 13 mins
features: CAREFUL SELECTION: All stems in this pompas grass are natural dried plants and carefully selected by us. special faux pampass grass bundle manufacturing technique ensures superior quality, and dried pompous grass lasts up to three years.（without pampas grass vase）

VARIOUS COMBINATIONS: beige pampas grass dried flower bouquet contains 15 white pampas grass, 15 brown pampa grass, 10 dried bunny tails, and 25 reed grass, Approximately 17 inches in height. You can trim the overall, stem length of the pompass grass according to the size of the pot

WIDE RANGE OF USES: these short pampas grass small are very suitable for home decor, wedding decoration, dried floral arrangements, boho room decor, bedroom, living room, dining room and boho vases for pampas grass, etc. you can dried pampas grass decor for wedding gifts, Halloween, Thanksgiving, Christmas, etc.

WARM TIP: You can fluff the pompass grass branches natural in the sun for a few hours before use. Shedding is normal because this pampus grass is a naturally dry plant. Once placed in a vase and hairspray, the shedding will be minimal. pompas floral may have some odor, please leave pompuss grass loose in a well ventilated area for 1-2 days. Greener than artificial pampas grass

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Your satisfaction is the only way for us to go further, we attach great importance to our customers' experience and satisfaction in buying natural pampas grass bouquet large, if you are not satisfied with mini pampas grass, please contact us as soon as possible, thank you for your support.
body.description: We attach great importance to customer satisfaction and buying experience, so we pompas grass dried flowers is carefully selected before shipment and placed neatly in the shipping package to ensure that each bundle is flawless if it appears that you are not satisfied with the pompous grass received, please contact us and we will give you a satisfactory answer. Your satisfaction is the only way for us to go further. Various combinations: made of naturally dried white pompuss grass, brown pampas grass, reed grass, and rabbit tail grass. More environmentally friendly than fake pampas grass tall. Perfect size: artificial pampas bouquet is about 14-17 inches, You can trim the length of the poles to your liking and simply add style to any home, event or retail space. Wide range of uses: small pampas grass decor are perfect for wedding bride decorations, bohemian home decorations, baby bathroom centerpiece, bridal gifts, kitchen tables, dressing rooms, dining rooms, living room tables, offices, farmhouse decorations, party gardens, balconies and more to create a warm and natural atmosphere. Note: Take out the mini cream pampas grass, pompass grass branches may be crushed and not fluffy during the long distance transportation. Leave the pampas grass bulk in the sun for a few hours and dried short pampas grass will regain its fluffy state. Apply hairspray and the shedding will be minimal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They were carefully packed and arrived in great quality. I let it fluff up a bit per the instructions. Such a beautiful bunch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They're So Fluffy!
reviews.reviewText: I followed the directions and left them in the sun. Two months later, they still look great and are part of my home decor. Excellent quality and great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a beautiful set of dried flowers, grass!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at my bid batch of dried flowers and dried grass. I put them in a neutral colored vase and they look great. There are 65 pieces in the package and so many different ways to arrange them. They are sturdy and stand off very nicely. They add a touch of elegance to my dining room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lovely, ample, very delicate
reviews.reviewText: These look great, and I had enough extra for two more small vases after filling the one pictured. This was even without follwing the "refluffing" instructions. The box they came on was so slim I thought I would be disappointed with the quantity inside, but I was mistaken - it'smore than sufficient for a narrow-necked vase. After reading other reviews, I took great care to arrange these gently so as not to break the stems or trigger shedding. The package comes with instructions - be sure to read them before opening the 4 bundles. I am eager to see how these hold up over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packaged with care! Absolutely beautiful!
reviews.reviewText: These are so worth buying and making your home cozy and elegant. I’m not one for flowers so these pampas grasses were just the thing I needed to complete a couple of decorating projects to soften my room. Love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars add a pop of flair on anything !
reviews.reviewText: absolutely love these !!!!!!! exactly what we were looking for at a great price, and we can reuse them over and over. ! if your looking for a fuller look place the beige ones in the sun for about 3 hours and they will fluff up !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this bundle to fill a couple of decorative vases in my office. I played around with the arrangement and decided not to mix the sets. Love the neutral colors. Looks very pleasant on top of my office credenza. There was some shedding, but nothing crazy. They have retained their shape so far and not become too droopy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: not quite what I wanted they need a lot of fluffing and I had to adjust the vase since they were shorter than I wanted but I made it work

reviews.reviewTitle: Boho Bliss with 65PCS Pampas Grass Decor - A Dreamy Addition to Home and Weddings
reviews.reviewText: I recently indulged in the 65PCS Pampas Grass Decor set, and I am absolutely enchanted by the ethereal beauty it brings to my home. This assortment, featuring pompas floral, reed dried grass, and bunny tails dried flowers, is a dreamy collection that has elevated my boho decor and added a touch of natural elegance.Versatile Assortment (5/5):The variety within this set is simply stunning. The inclusion of pompas floral, reed dried grass, and bunny tails dried flowers allows for endless creative possibilities. Whether arranged together or used individually, each element contributes to a unique and captivating aesthetic.Natural Boho Vibes (5/5):The natural hues and textures of the dried grass and flowers perfectly capture the essence of bohemian decor. The earthy tones and feathery textures create a whimsical and relaxed atmosphere, bringing the outdoors inside and effortlessly enhancing the overall vibe of my home.Perfect for Boho Weddings (5/5):If you're planning a boho-themed wedding, this Pampas Grass Decor set is a must-have. The assortment of dried elements adds a romantic and bohemian touch to any wedding decor. The delicate bunny tails and wispy pompas floral are particularly enchanting, creating an unforgettable ambiance.Quality and Durability (5/5):The quality of the dried grass and flowers is exceptional. They arrived in perfect condition, and I was pleasantly surprised by their durability. The delicate appearance does not compromise their resilience, making them a long-lasting and reliable addition to my decor.Easy to Arrange (5/5):Arranging the pampas grass and dried flowers was a delightful and stress-free experience. The stems are pliable, allowing for easy shaping and styling. Whether creating a centerpiece, adding a boho touch to a vase, or incorporating them into wreaths, the flexibility of these elements makes decorating a breeze.Boho-Chic Home Decor (5/5):The 65PCS Pampas Grass Decor has become a focal point in my home decor. Whether adorning a mantel, sprucing up a shelf, or creating a boho-chic centerpiece, these dried elements infuse a sense of natural beauty and tranquility into every corner of my living space.Eco-Friendly and Sustainable (5/5):I appreciate the eco-friendly and sustainable nature of these dried elements. They add charm to my decor while aligning with my commitment to environmentally conscious choices. The dried grass and flowers are a wonderful alternative to traditional, short-lived decorations.Conclusion:The 65PCS Pampas Grass Decor set has exceeded my expectations in terms of quality, variety, and boho charm. Whether you're looking to enhance your home decor or add a magical touch to a boho-themed event, this assortment is a delightful choice. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a natural and enchanting addition to their living space or special occasions. It has truly transformed my decor, and I couldn't be happier with the dreamy ambiance it has created. A five-star investment for those who appreciate the allure of boho elegance.

They're beautiful, added that sophisticated look I needed to our golden vase. They're fragile as expected, light weight so handle with care. Worth buying if you're looking for that expensive look but a reasonable price and there's a lot that comes in the well packed box.
I was so pleased with this order. They look gorgeous in my new vase
Overall good quality but a few were broken and crooked

I ordered this for my coffee table's vases and they look amazing. They don't shed at all even straight out of the package and even though they haven't fluff out yet it's already looking great so I can't wait to see what it is going to look like when they do. Overall very satisfied with my purchase and I recommend!
